mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_permit from hub_user_role ur, hub_role r, hub_role_menu rm, hub_menu m where m.menu_status = 1 and m.menu_type in('B', 'C') and m.tenant_id in('#', #{tenantId}) and ur.role_id = r.role_id and r.role_id = rm.role_id and rm.menu_id = m.menu_id and (ur.user_id = #{userId} or m.is_protected = 0) and m.menu_permit is not null
mapper.delete: with recursive tree (menu_id, parent_id) as (select m1.menu_id, m1.parent_id from hub_menu m1 where parent_id = #{menuId} or menu_id = #{menuId} union select m2.menu_id, m2.parent_id from hub_menu m2 join tree on m2.parent_id = tree.menu_id) delete from hub_role_menu rm using tree where rm.menu_id = tree.menu_id
